summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; declaring that portion of the Riverton Heights Reservoir site located at the corner of South 146th Street and 24th Avenue South in SeaTac, Washington (Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., King County, Washington) to be surplus to the City's needs and not required for continued utility service; and authorizing the sale of such property to the City of SeaTac.
committee: Water Resources, Solid Waste and Public Health
